translations: v.以……为标志；授予……奖章（badge 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 车首名牌, 车首铭牌
贵重金属微章, 贵重金属徽章

sentences.sentence: It might mean monitoring employee productivity on a digital leaderboard and offering prizes to the winners, or giving employees digital badges or stars for completing certain activities.
sentences.translation: 这可能意味着，在数字排行榜上监督员工的工作效率，并为优胜者提供奖品，或者为完成某些任务的员工颁发数字徽章或星星奖励。

sentences.sentence: All employees have to wear name badges.
sentences.translation: 所有员工均须佩戴名牌。

sentences.sentence: We have come to believe that someone who has more educational merit badges, who is very good at some form of school discipline is "intelligent".
sentences.translation: 我们开始相信，那些拥有更多教育荣誉勋章的人，那些在某个学校学科方面非常优秀的人是“聪明的”。
